item.description:
Featuring Sarah Teagle

DJ Bright Eyes

Smooth Mellow Steppin Tunes

Slade's famous Kitchen

No Cover charge

Steppin Set is open to TOSOB Steppers and invited guest

 

** Come and watch Boston couples make history at our first Steppers Contest. Join us to see which Steppers will "Show Up 2 Show Out" ! The Steppers will put it all out on the dance floor, displaying all of their steppin' skills in an effort to earn the title of contest winner.
The contestants are all practicing hard, perfecting their skills to put on a good display of their Steppin' styles. The contest will start around 6:30pm**
Contest registration forms are still being accepted. Get your from Val. Steven or the Certified Steppin' Instructors at our classes, practices and events. Don't delay - register now.
More details will be posted soon.  Have questions? Contact - steppersboston06@aol.com or Gentleman Scott
item.how_to_find_us: The Original Steppers of Boston Will Be on the dance floor

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin' at Slade's Set with Sarah & Steppers Contest
